review: I've gained 15 LBS since purchasing my Apple TV. I love it. I'm addicted to watching Netflix- or YouTube videos on the big screen. If you want a fabulous little box that connects you to the world- purchase the AppleTV. If you want to not sit on your couch and binge watch The Orange is the New Black in style- don't buy this. The remote is super simple and easy to learn. My 6 year old picked it up in no time. The only thing I will say is that tthe remote is super tiny so sometimes it gets lost in the couch and I have to physically stand up to find it- bummer, I know.
